articles.title: Scientists use microwave oven to turn coal into graphite - MINING.COM - MINING.com
articles.description: Nano-graphite was obtained from coal by using copper foil, glass containers and a conventional household microwave oven.
articles.content: This one-step method with metal-assisted microwave treatment is a new approach that, in their view, could represent a simple and relatively inexpensive coal-conversion technology to make good use of … [+1258 chars]

articles.description: Lenovo has announced an OLED variant of the Yoga Slim 7i Pro that was originally introduced last year. The Yoga Slim 7i Pro's OLED display comes in a 16:10 aspect ratio and offers a 90 Hz refresh rate with 100% DCI-P3 coverage and Dolby Vision HDR support. Po…
articles.content: Lenovo offers the 14-inch Yoga Slim 7 in both Intel and AMD variants. We have previously reviewed the Yoga Slim 7 powered by AMD Ryzen 7 4800U and the Ryzen 7 4700U and also the SKU powered by the Co… [+1626 chars]
